thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 08 Mar 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Global Partners Reports Q4 Earnings Per Share $0.55

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Global Partners Reports Q4 Earnings Per Share $0.55
text:
March 8 (Reuters) - Global Partners Lp:
* GLOBAL PARTNERS REPORTS FOURTH-QUARTER AND FULL-YEAR 2017 FINANCIAL RESULTS
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.55 * GLOBAL PARTNERS - ‍AS A RESULT TAX CUTS AND JOBS ACT, CO’S FINANCIAL RESULTS FOR Q4 OF 2017 REFLECT A NON-CASH TAX BENEFIT OF $22.2 MILLION​
* ‍FOR FULL-YEAR 2018, GLOBAL EXPECTS TO GENERATE EBITDA OF $180 MILLION TO $210 MILLION​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Brief@thomsonreuters.com)
Our Standards: The Thomson Reuters Trust Principles.
